title: Sound On: Russia Military Moves, Taxes, Marijuana Vote
itunes:title: Sound On: Russia Military Moves, Taxes, Marijuana Vote
description:
Guests: Republican Congressman Brian Steil of Wisconsin, former Ambassador James Jeffrey, Chair of the Wilson Center Middle East Program, George Seay, Chairman of Annandale Capital and The Clements Center for National Security, Michael Correia, director of government relations for the National Cannabis Industry Association, and Bloomberg politics contributor Jeanne Sheehan Zaino.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
